sub_topic: Preparation of benzocaine from p-aminobenzoic acid and ethanol
message_1: What is the theoretical yield of benzocaine that can be obtained from the reaction between p-aminobenzoic acid and ethanol, assuming a 100% yield and using the stoichiometry of the reaction?
message_2: To calculate the theoretical yield of benzocaine, we need to know the amounts of p-aminobenzoic acid and ethanol used in the reaction. Please provide the amounts of each reactant in grams or moles.
